Package org.opt4j.core.config

Class JNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opt4j.core.config.JNode
  • public class JNode
extends Object
    Wrapper for Node elements. This class integrates Java 5 functionality with generics.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      JNode​(Document document, String name)
      Constructs a new JNode for a Document.
      JNode​(Node node)
      Creates a Wrapper JNode for a Node element.
